entry.title: Thursday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near noon then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow north of Cape Ray this morning and early this afternoon. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Thursday 29 December 2022
